00092 BOOLEAN EnterInsurance()
00093 {
00094   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00095       UINT16                              usPosX, i;
00096 
00097       SetBookMark( INSURANCE_BOOKMARK );
00098 
00099       InitInsuranceDefaults();
00100 
00101       // load the Insurance title graphic and add it
00102       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00103       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_INSURANCETITLE );
00104       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiInsuranceTitleImage));
00105 
00106       // load the red bar on the side of the page and add it
00107       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00108       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\Bullet.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00109       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiInsuranceBulletImage));
00110 
00111       usPosX = INSURANCE_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_X;
00112       for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00113       {
00114             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedInsuranceLinkRegion[i], usPosX, INSURANCE_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_Y-37, (UINT16)(usPosX + INSURANCE_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_WIDTH), INSURANCE_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_Y+2, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00115                                      CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectInsuranceRegionCallBack); 
00116             MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedInsuranceLinkRegion[i]); 
00117             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSelectedInsuranceLinkRegion[i], 0, i ); 
00118 
00119             usPosX += INSURANCE_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_OFFSET;
00120       }
00121 
00122       RenderInsurance();
00123 
00124       // reset the current merc index on the insurance contract page
00125       gsCurrentInsuranceMercIndex = 0;
00126 
00127       return(TRUE);
00128 }
00129 
00130 void ExitInsurance()
00131 {
00132       UINT8 i;
00133 
00134       RemoveInsuranceDefaults();
00135 
00136       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiInsuranceTitleImage );
00137       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiInsuranceBulletImage );
00138 
00139       for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00140             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedInsuranceLinkRegion[i]);
00141 
00142 }

00149 void RenderInsurance()
00150 {
00151       wchar_t           sText[800];
00152   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00153 
00154       DisplayInsuranceDefaults();
00155 
00156       SetFontShadow( INS_FONT_SHADOW );
00157 
00158       //Get and display the insurance title
00159       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiInsuranceTitleImage );
00160       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, INSURANCE_BIG_TITLE_X, INSURANCE_BIG_TITLE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00161 
00162 
00163       //Display the title slogan
00164       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_WERE_LISTENING, sText );
00165       DrawTextToScreen( sText, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X, INSURANCE_TOP_RED_BAR_Y-35, LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X-LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X, INS_FONT_BIG, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00166 
00167       //Display the subtitle slogan
00168       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_LIFE_INSURANCE_SPECIALISTS, sText );
00169       DrawTextToScreen( sText, INSURANCE_SUBTITLE_X, INSURANCE_SUBTITLE_Y, 0, INS_FONT_BIG, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00170 
00171       //Display the bulleted text 1
00172       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiInsuranceBulletImage );
00173       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, INSURANCE_SUBTITLE_X, INSURANCE_BULLET_TEXT_1_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00174       GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_EMPLOY_HIGH_RISK, sText );
00175       DrawTextToScreen( sText, INSURANCE_SUBTITLE_X+INSURANCE_BULLET_TEXT_OFFSET_X, INSURANCE_BULLET_TEXT_1_Y, 0, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00176 
00177       //Display the bulleted text 2
00178       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, INSURANCE_SUBTITLE_X, INSURANCE_BULLET_TEXT_2_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00179       GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_HIGH_FATALITY_RATE, sText );
00180       DrawTextToScreen( sText, INSURANCE_SUBTITLE_X+INSURANCE_BULLET_TEXT_OFFSET_X, INSURANCE_BULLET_TEXT_2_Y, 0, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00181 
00182       //Display the bulleted text 3
00183       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, INSURANCE_SUBTITLE_X, INSURANCE_BULLET_TEXT_3_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00184       GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_DRAIN_SALARY, sText );
00185       DrawTextToScreen( sText, INSURANCE_SUBTITLE_X+INSURANCE_BULLET_TEXT_OFFSET_X, INSURANCE_BULLET_TEXT_3_Y, 0, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00186 
00187       //Display the bottom slogan
00188       GetInsuranceText( INS_MLTI_IF_ANSWERED_YES, sText );
00189       DrawTextToScreen( sText, INSURANCE_BOTTOM_SLOGAN_X, INSURANCE_BOTTOM_SLOGAN_Y, INSURANCE_BOTTOM_SLOGAN_WIDTH, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00190 
00191 
00192       //Display the red bar under the link at the bottom.  and the text
00193       DisplaySmallRedLineWithShadow( INSURANCE_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_X, INSURANCE_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_Y, INSURANCE_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_X+INSURANCE_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_WIDTH, INSURANCE_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_Y);
00194 
00195       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_COMMENTSFROM_CLIENTS, sText );
00196       DisplayWrappedString( INSURANCE_LINK_TEXT_1_X, INSURANCE_LINK_TEXT_1_Y, INSURANCE_LINK_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00197       
00198 
00199       //Display the red bar under the link at the bottom
00200       DisplaySmallRedLineWithShadow( INSURANCE_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_X_2, INSURANCE_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_Y, INSURANCE_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_X_2+INSURANCE_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_WIDTH, INSURANCE_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_Y);
00201 
00202       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_HOW_DOES_INS_WORK, sText );
00203       DisplayWrappedString( INSURANCE_LINK_TEXT_2_X, INSURANCE_LINK_TEXT_2_Y+7, INSURANCE_LINK_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00204 
00205 
00206       //Display the red bar under the link at the bottom
00207       DisplaySmallRedLineWithShadow( INSURANCE_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_X_3, INSURANCE_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_Y, INSURANCE_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_X_3+INSURANCE_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_WIDTH, INSURANCE_BOTTOM_LINK_RED_BAR_Y);
00208 
00209       GetInsuranceText( INS_SNGL_TO_ENTER_REVIEW, sText );
00210       DisplayWrappedString( INSURANCE_LINK_TEXT_3_X, INSURANCE_LINK_TEXT_3_Y+7, INSURANCE_LINK_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, INS_FONT_MED, INS_FONT_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00211 
00212 
00213 
00214       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
00215 
00216   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00217       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00218   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00219 }

00221 
00222 BOOLEAN InitInsuranceDefaults()
00223 {
00224   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00225 
00226       // load the Flower Account Box graphic and add it
00227       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00228       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\BackGroundTile.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00229       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiInsuranceBackGround));
00230 
00231       // load the red bar on the side of the page and add it
00232       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00233       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\LeftTile.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00234       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiInsuranceRedBarImage));
00235 
00236       // load the red bar on the side of the page and add it
00237       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00238       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\LargeBar.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00239       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiInsuranceBigRedLineImage));
00240 
00241       //if it is not the first page, display the small title
00242       if( guiCurrentLaptopMode != LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE )
00243       {
00244             // load the small title for the every page other then the first page
00245             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00246             GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_SMALLTITLE );
00247             CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiInsuranceSmallTitleImage));
00248 
00249             //create the link to the home page on the small titles
00250             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedInsuranceTitleLinkRegion, INSURANCE_SMALL_TITLE_X+85, INSURANCE_SMALL_TITLE_Y, (UINT16)(INSURANCE_SMALL_TITLE_X + INSURANCE_SMALL_TITLE_WIDTH), (UINT16)(INSURANCE_SMALL_TITLE_Y+INSURANCE_SMALL_TITLE_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00251                                      CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectInsuranceTitleLinkRegionCallBack); 
00252             MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedInsuranceTitleLinkRegion); 
00253       }
00254 
00255       return( TRUE );
00256 }
00257 
00258 void DisplayInsuranceDefaults()
00259 {
00260   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00261       UINT8 i;
00262       UINT16      usPosY;
00263 
00264       WebPageTileBackground(4, 4, INSURANCE_BACKGROUND_WIDTH, INSURANCE_BACKGROUND_HEIGHT, guiInsuranceBackGround);
00265 
00266       usPosY = INSURANCE_RED_BAR_Y;
00267 
00268       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiInsuranceRedBarImage );
00269       for(i=0; i<4; i++)
00270       {
00271             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, INSURANCE_RED_BAR_X, usPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00272             usPosY += INSURANCE_BACKGROUND_HEIGHT;
00273       }
00274 
00275       //display the top red bar
00276       switch( guiCurrentLaptopMode )
00277       {
00278             case LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE:
00279                   usPosY = INSURANCE_TOP_RED_BAR_Y;
00280 
00281                   //display the top red bar
00282                   GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiInsuranceBigRedLineImage );
00283                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, INSURANCE_TOP_RED_BAR_X, usPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00284 
00285                   break;
00286 
00287             case LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE_INFO:
00288             case LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE_CONTRACT:
00289                   usPosY = INSURANCE_TOP_RED_BAR_Y1;
00290                   break;
00291       }
00292 
00293       //display the Bottom red bar
00294       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiInsuranceBigRedLineImage );
00295       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, INSURANCE_TOP_RED_BAR_X, INSURANCE_BOTTOM_RED_BAR_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00296 
00297       //if it is not the first page, display the small title
00298       if( guiCurrentLaptopMode != LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE )
00299       {
00300             //display the small title bar
00301             GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiInsuranceSmallTitleImage );
00302             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, INSURANCE_SMALL_TITLE_X, INSURANCE_SMALL_TITLE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00303       }
00304 }
00305 
00306 void RemoveInsuranceDefaults()
00307 {
00308       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiInsuranceBackGround );
00309       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiInsuranceRedBarImage );
00310       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiInsuranceBigRedLineImage );
00311 
00312       //if it is not the first page, display the small title
00313       if( guiPreviousLaptopMode != LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE )
00314       {
00315             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiInsuranceSmallTitleImage );
00316             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedInsuranceTitleLinkRegion );
00317       }
00318 }

00321 void DisplaySmallRedLineWithShadow( UINT16 usStartX, UINT16 usStartY, UINT16 EndX, UINT16 EndY)
00322 {
00323   UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
00324   UINT8 *pDestBuf;
00325 
00326       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );               
00327 
00328       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
00329 
00330   // draw the red line 
00331       LineDraw(FALSE, usStartX, usStartY, EndX, EndY, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 255, 0, 0 ) ), pDestBuf);
00332 
00333   // draw the black shadow line 
00334       LineDraw(FALSE, usStartX+1, usStartY+1, EndX+1, EndY+1, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ), pDestBuf);
00335       
00336       // unlock frame buffer
00337       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
00338 }
00339 
00340 void GetInsuranceText( UINT8 ubNumber, STR16 pString )
00341 {
00342       UINT32      uiStartLoc=0;
00343 
00344       if( ubNumber < INS_MULTI_LINE_BEGINS )
00345       {
00346             //Get and display the card saying
00347             uiStartLoc = INSURANCE_TEXT_SINGLE_LINE_SIZE * ubNumber;
00348             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(INSURANCE_TEXT_SINGLE_FILE, pString, uiStartLoc, INSURANCE_TEXT_SINGLE_LINE_SIZE );
00349       }
00350       else
00351       {
00352             //Get and display the card saying
00353             uiStartLoc = INSURANCE_TEXT_MULTI_LINE_SIZE * ( ubNumber - INS_MULTI_LINE_BEGINS - 1 );
00354             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(INSURANCE_TEXT_MULTI_FILE, pString, uiStartLoc, INSURANCE_TEXT_MULTI_LINE_SIZE );
00355       }
00356 }

00358 
00359 void SelectInsuranceRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00360 { 
00361       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00362       {
00363       }
00364       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00365       {
00366             UINT32 uiInsuranceLink = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00367 
00368             if( uiInsuranceLink == 0 )
00369                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE_COMMENTS;
00370             else if( uiInsuranceLink == 1 )
00371                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE_INFO;
00372             else if( uiInsuranceLink == 2 )
00373                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE_CONTRACT;
00374       }
00375       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00376       {
00377       } 
00378 }
00379 
00380 void SelectInsuranceTitleLinkRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00381 { 
00382       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00383       {
00384       }
00385       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00386       {
00387             guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_INSURANCE;
00388       }
00389       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00390       {
00391       } 
00392 }
